text: Jürgen Friedl is an Austrian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Union Weißkirchen. He has played for several clubs since 2001, including Red Bull Salzburg in the Bundesliga.Profile at sport.de ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian Football Bundesliga players Category:FC Red Bull Salzburg players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Austrian footballers Category:ASKÖ Pasching players
title: Jürgen Friedl
